BOOLEAN SerialSocket::Close (   )  [virtual]
 

Closes the socket.

Returns:
TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.

BOOLEAN SerialSocket::IsBlocking (   )  const [virtual]
 

This function is not supported for this socket. provided here only for compatibility

Implements Socket.

BOOLEAN SerialSocket::IsOpen (   )  const [virtual]
 

Checks if the socket connection is open.

Returns:
TRUE if open, FALSE otherwise.

Implements Socket.

void SerialSocket::OnControlMsg (  const SocketControlMsg &  msg  )  [virtual]
 

Translates the socket control message msg into a socket event and routes it accordingly. If a listener is set, its OnSocketEvent method is called. Otherwise the messages are discarded.

Reimplemented from Socket.

BOOLEAN SerialSocket::Open (  SerialIoAdapter::SocketFamily  fam,
INT  protocol
) 
 

Please refer to sock_create in sio_sock.h

Parameters:
fam specifies the socket family.
protocol specifies the protocol to be used. Refer to BtProtocol in BtSocketAddr.
Returns:
0 on success and -1 on failure.

optval pointer to the option value

Returns:
